GSP31samkhsuu:6: prātyahika kṣutpratīkāravat tatpratīkāra ceṣṭanāt puruṣārthatvaṃ / KapSs_1.3 /
GSP31samkhsuu:27: na kālayogato vyāpino nityasya sarvasambandhāt / KapSs_1.12 /
GSP31samkhsuu:41: na nityaśuddha buddhamukta svabhāvasya tadyogastadyogāhate / KapSs_1.19 /
GSP31samkhsuu:60: na bāhyābhyantarayoḥ uparajyopañjaka bhāvo 'pi deśavyavadhānāt srughnastha pāṭaliputrasthayoriva / KapSs_1.28 /
GSP31samkhsuu:70: nāsti hi tatra sthira eka ātmā yo garbhādhānādikarmaṇā saṃskriyate / KapSs_1.33 /
GSP31samkhsuu:198: yat saṃbaddhaṃ sat tadākārollekhi vijñānaṃ tat pratyakṣaṃ / KapSs_1.89 /
GSP31samkhsuu:210: muktātmanaḥ praśaṃsā upāsā siddhasya vā / KapSs_1.95 /
GSP31samkhsuu:218: antaḥ karaṇasya tadujjvalitatvāt lohavat adhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ / KapSs_1.99 /
GSP31samkhsuu:276: ladhvaidi dharmaiḥ sādharmyaṃ ca guṇānāṃ / KapSs_1.128 /
GSP31samkhsuu:324: evamekatvena parivartamānasya na viruddha dharmādhyāsaḥ / KapSs_1.152 /
GSP31samkhsuu:349: (vastutattvaviparītataya puruṣe kartṛtāyāḥ buddhau jñātṛtāyāśca bhāne hetuḥ)
GSP31samkhsuu:429: dvayoḥ pradhānaṃ mano lokavat bhṛtyavargeṣu / KapSs_2.40 /
GSP31samkhsuu:458: mātāpitṛjaṃ sthūlaṃ prāyaśaḥ itaranna tathā / KapSs_3.7 /
GSP31samkhsuu:576: viviktabodhāt sṛṣṭinivṛttiḥ pradhānasya sūdavat pāke / KapSs_3.64 /
GSP31samkhsuu:597: rūpaiḥ saptabhiḥ ātmānaṃ badhnāti pradhānaṃ kośakāravadvimocayetyekarūpeṇa / KapSs_3.74 /
GSP31samkhsuu:638: bahubhiryoge virodhaḥ rāgādibhiḥ kumārī kaṅkaṇa (śaṅkha) vat / KapSs_4.9 /
GSP31samkhsuu:658: praṇatibrahmacaryopasarpaṇāni kṛtvā siddhiḥ bahukālāt tadvat / KapSs_4.19 /
GSP31samkhsuu:684: na bhūtiyoge 'pi kṛtakṛtyatā upāsyasiddhivat upāsyasiddhivat / KapSs_4.32 /
GSP31samkhsuu:763: na kārye niyamaḥ ubhayathā darśanāt / KapSs_5.39 /
GSP31samkhsuu:769: na yajñādeḥ svarūpato dharmatvaṃ vaiśiṣṭyāt / KapSs_5.42 /
GSP31samkhsuu:823: na vyāpakatvaṃ manasaḥ karaṇatvādindriyatvādvā vāsyādivaccakṣurādivacca / KapSs_5.69 /
GSP31samkhsuu:846: saṃyogāśca vibhāgāntā iti na deśādilābho 'pi / KapSs_5.80 /
GSP31samkhsuu:897: na sthūlamiti niyamaḥ ātivāhikasyāpi vidyāmānatvāt / KapSs_5.103 /
GSP31samkhsuu:901: na tejo 'pasarpaṇāt taijasa cakṣuḥ vṛttitastatsiddheḥ / KapSs_5.105 /
GSP31samkhsuu:905: bhāgaguṇābhyāṃ tatvāntaraṃ vṛttiḥ sambandhārthaṃ sarpatīti / KapSs_5.107 /
GSP31samkhsuu:913: ūṣmajāṇḍajajarāyujodbhijjasāṅkālpika sāṃsiddhikaṃ ceti na niyamaḥ / KapSs_5.111 /
GSP31samkhsuu:915: sarveṣu pṛthivyupādānaṃ asādhāraṇyāt tadvyapadeśaḥ pūrvavat / KapSs_5.112 /
GSP31samkhsuu:927: dvayoriva trayasyāpi dṛṣṭatvāt na tu dvau / KapSs_5.118 /
GSP31samkhsuu:929: vāsanayā na svārthakhyāpanaṃ doṣayoge 'pi na nimittasya pradhānabādhakatvaṃ / KapSs_5.119 /
GSP31samkhsuu:931: ekaḥ saṃskāraḥ kriyānirvartakaḥ na tu pratikriyaṃ saṃskārabhedā bahukalpanāprasakteḥ / KapSs_5.120 /
GSP31samkhsuu:949: na bhūtacaitanyaṃ pratyekādṛṣṭeḥ sāṃhatye 'pi ca sāṃhatye 'pi ca / KapSs_5.129 /
GSP31samkhsuu:968: tadapi duḥkhaśabalitamiti duḥkhapakṣe nikṣipante vivecakāḥ / KapSs_6.8 /
GSP31samkhsuu:1054: na śrutivirodho rāgiṇāṃ verāgyāya tatsiddheḥ / KapSs_6.51 /
GSP31samkhsuu:1070: gatiśruteśca vyāpakatve 'pi upādhiyogāt bhogadeśakālalābhaḥ vyomavat / KapSs_6.59 /
GSP31samkhsuu:1124: nāsau punaḥ trividhena duḥkhenābhibhūyate nābhibhīyate / Tats_2.18 /
